title: Portfolio App
description: A modern Angular portfolio with retrowave styling, internationalization, and responsive design.

detailedDescription.title: Overview
detailedDescription.content: This portfolio showcases my skills and projects with a unique retrowave aesthetic inspired by pattybuilds.dev. Built with Angular 19, it features modern web technologies and responsive design principles.

detailedDescription.title: Key Features
detailedDescription.content: Internationalization support for multiple languages, responsive design that works on all devices, smooth animations and transitions, and a modular component architecture for maintainability.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Stack
detailedDescription.content: Angular 19, TypeScript, SCSS, Angular Router, and modern CSS features like CSS Grid and Flexbox for layout. The project follows Angular best practices and modern development workflows.

title: Clickoin
description: A clicker game with coin skins, drops, and Steam integration. Built with Unity and C#.

detailedDescription.title: Game Overview
detailedDescription.content: Clickoin is an addictive clicker game where players collect coins, unlock skins, and discover rare drops. The game features Steam integration for achievements and cloud saves.

detailedDescription.title: Development Process
detailedDescription.content: Developed over 6 months using Unity 2022.3 LTS, the game went through multiple iterations based on player feedback. Steam integration was implemented using the Steamworks.NET library.

title: Barcode Scanner
description: TypeScript-based barcode scanning application with modern web technologies for product identification.

detailedDescription.title: Application Overview
detailedDescription.content: A web-based barcode scanner built with TypeScript and modern web technologies, providing real-time product identification and information retrieval.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Implementation
detailedDescription.content: Utilizes WebRTC for camera access, image processing algorithms for barcode detection, and integration with product databases for information lookup.

title: Ukraine Weather App
description: Weather dashboard built with Angular 7 using OpenWeather API and an interactive SVG map of Ukraine.

detailedDescription.title: Project Overview
detailedDescription.content: A single-page Angular application displaying current weather conditions across cities in Ukraine. Built with Angular 7 and integrated with OpenWeatherMap API.

detailedDescription.title: Key Features
detailedDescription.content: Data visualization on an interactive SVG map of Ukraine, API consumption with HTTPClient, dynamic city tooltips, and custom UI components for temperature, humidity, and conditions.

title: Simple Smart House
description: IoT smart home system using Arduino with sensors and Blynk integration for home automation.

detailedDescription.title: Project Overview
detailedDescription.content: A comprehensive IoT smart home system that integrates various sensors and actuators for home automation. The system provides real-time monitoring and control capabilities.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Features
detailedDescription.content: Built with Arduino microcontrollers, various sensors (temperature, humidity, motion), and Blynk platform for mobile app integration. Features include automated lighting, climate control, and security monitoring.

title: Time Travel Unity Game
description: Unity 5 game development project featuring time travel mechanics and innovative gameplay elements.

detailedDescription.title: Game Concept
detailedDescription.content: An innovative Unity 5 game that explores time travel mechanics, allowing players to manipulate time to solve puzzles and overcome challenges.

detailedDescription.title: Development Highlights
detailedDescription.content: Features custom time manipulation systems, particle effects for temporal distortions, and innovative puzzle mechanics that require players to think across multiple time periods.

title: Little RTS Game
description: Real-time strategy game built in Unity 5 as a test task for Enixan, featuring strategic gameplay mechanics.

detailedDescription.title: Game Overview
detailedDescription.content: A real-time strategy game developed as a test task for Enixan, featuring classic RTS mechanics including resource management, unit production, and tactical combat.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Features
detailedDescription.content: Built with Unity 5, featuring AI pathfinding, unit behavior systems, resource management, and multiplayer-ready architecture. Demonstrates strong game development fundamentals.

title: FNaF-Style Horror Game
description: Unity 5 horror game inspired by Five Nights at Freddy’s. Built following tutorials but extended with custom camera and pathfinding systems.

detailedDescription.title: Learning Focus
detailedDescription.content: This project was inspired by the mechanics of FNaF and used primarily as a learning exercise to understand Unity’s camera system, scene management, and AI pathfinding.

detailedDescription.title: Key Features
detailedDescription.content: Implemented basic AI that roams the environment based on a grid-based pathfinding system, camera switching logic for a security room simulation, and tension-building audio and light control.

title: Unity Solar System Explorer
description: An interactive 3D solar system simulation created in Unity 5, allowing free camera movement and orbiting planets.

detailedDescription.title: Project Summary
detailedDescription.content: Built as a space simulation sandbox where players can freely explore a simplified solar system with orbiting planets and rotation systems.

detailedDescription.title: Implementation Details
detailedDescription.content: Used Unity’s transform system to simulate orbital rotation, added basic camera control to fly through space, and styled planets with public domain textures.

title: ATM System
description: Complete ATM management system built with C# WinForms and MS SQL Server for banking operations.

detailedDescription.title: System Overview
detailedDescription.content: A comprehensive ATM management system that simulates real banking operations including account management, transactions, and security features.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Implementation
detailedDescription.content: Built with C# WinForms for the user interface and MS SQL Server for data persistence. Features include user authentication, transaction processing, account management, and detailed reporting.

title: суп суп
description: Database management system for tracking student exam scores using C# WinForms and MS SQL Server.

detailedDescription.title: System Overview
detailedDescription.content: A comprehensive database management system designed for educational institutions to track and manage student exam scores and academic performance.

detailedDescription.title: Features
detailedDescription.content: Student registration, exam score tracking, grade calculation, performance analytics, and detailed reporting. Built with C# WinForms and MS SQL Server for robust data management.

title: Text Formatter
description: C# WPF application for text formatting and manipulation with a modern desktop interface.

detailedDescription.title: Application Overview
detailedDescription.content: A desktop application built with C# WPF that provides advanced text formatting and manipulation capabilities.

detailedDescription.title: Key Features
detailedDescription.content: Text case conversion, formatting options, find and replace functionality, syntax highlighting, and export capabilities. Built with MVVM pattern for maintainable code architecture.
